title: 108_s864
content: The "National Guard and Reserves Child Care Relief Act" authorizes appropriations for child care assistance for military dependents under the Child Care and Development Block Grant Act of 1990. $10,000,000 is authorized for each fiscal year from 2004 to 2008 for this purpose. The Secretary will provide grants to eligible persons for child care services for dependents by eligible providers. Eligible persons are parents of dependents who are members of a reserve component. The Secretary provides grants for child care services to eligible persons who are parents of dependents of members of a reserve component of the Armed Forces serving on active duty for more than 30 days. The Secretary provides grants for child care services to eligible persons who are parents of dependents of members of the Armed Forces on active duty involved in a military operation, residing permanently at least 50 miles from a military installation with child care facilities. The term 'military operation' refers to specific operations like Operation Enduring Freedom, Operation Iraqi Freedom, and Operation Noble Eagle. The grant provides child care services to eligible parents of military members on active duty residing at least 50 miles from a military installation with child care facilities. The grant provides child care services to eligible parents of military members on active duty. To receive the grant, applicants must submit an application to the Department of Defense. The term 'military operation' includes specific operations like Operation Enduring Freedom and Operation Iraqi Freedom. To apply for the grant providing child care services to eligible parents of military members on active duty, an application must be submitted to the Secretary with required information, including details of the child care provider. The provisions of this subchapter, excluding section 658P, do not apply to assistance provided under this section. SEC. 4. CONFORMING AMENDMENTS. Amends Section 658O of the Child Care and Development Block Grant Act of 1990 to specify changes in appropriations under different sections.
